title: windows: msi installed godoc server shortcut not working on Windows XP/2K
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Install Go using the msi installer on Windows XP or 2K
2. Double click on the GoDocServer desktop or program menu  icon


What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Expect a shell window to spawn and stay open then a web browser window, pointing to
http://localhost:6060, with the Golang page. On Windows XP and 2K the shell window
spawns but shuts down prior to the browser window opening so the browser shows unknown
host.  


The shortcut uses some command line magic, see GoDocServerDesktopShortcut in
misc/dist/windows/installer.wxs, that only seem to work on windows 7.
